sentences.en: And then her hand closed on his and pressed feverishly.
sentences.cn: 于是她抓住了他的手狂热地捏.

sentences.en: Both sides are feverishly trying to recruit new members to bolster their cause at the IWC.
sentences.cn: 两派都在积极地招收新成员来巩固自己在国际捕鲸委员会中的利益.

sentences.en: City workers and volunteers are working feverishly to remove the heavy snow from the roofs of homes.
sentences.cn: 市政工人和志愿者在紧张地忙碌着，将积雪从房顶上除去。

sentences.en: Elsewhere, markets feverishly adjusted to stronger evidence that the economic green shoots are for real.
sentences.cn: 在其它地区,更有力的证据表明经济(复苏)萌芽确然存在, 市场对此作出积极调整.

sentences.en: Four furry friends frolicking feverishly for fun.
sentences.cn: 四只毛茸茸快乐嬉戏的的朋友,真好玩.

sentences.en: He burrowed into the pile of charts feverishly.
sentences.cn: 他非常紧张地在一堆图表中翻找。

sentences.en: He slept feverishly all afternoon and into the night.
sentences.cn: 他发着烧，睡了一下午，一直睡到晚上。

sentences.en: I began to work feverishly on the radio beacons.
sentences.cn: 我开始拼命地研究无线电信标.

sentences.en: Motherly love is how strong, selfish and feverishly occupied mind the feelings of the whole. ( Duncan )
sentences.cn: 母爱是多么强烈 、 自私、狂热地占据我们整个心灵的感情. ( 邓肯 )

sentences.en: She seemed almost feverishly anxious to attend to his comfort.
sentences.cn: 她似乎迫不及待地急于去体贴安慰他.

sentences.en: The company is having to cast around feverishly for ways to cut its costs.
sentences.cn: 公司迫切须要想出各种降低成本的办法.

words.tran_cn: 发热；高度兴奋（fever的过去式和过去分词）
使发烧；使狂热；使患热病
